channel.title: CVE Feed for Uniview -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Uniview -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-0773|2024-08-02T05:24:33.898Z -- uniview -- uniview%20ip%20camera%20ipc322lb-sf28-a
item.description:
The vulnerability exists in Uniview IP Camera due to identification and authentication failure at its web-based management interface. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending specially crafted HTTP requests to the vulnerable device.
Successful exploitation of this vulnerability could allow the attacker to gain complete control of the targeted device.

item.title: CVE-2024-3850|2024-07-12T19:30:50.391Z -- uniview -- nvr301-04s2-p4
item.description: Uniview NVR301-04S2-P4 is vulnerable to reflected cross-site scripting attack (XSS). An attacker could send a user a URL that if clicked on could execute malicious JavaScript in their browser. This vulnerability also requires authentication before it can be exploited, so the scope and severity is limited. Also, even if JavaScript is executed, no additional benefits are obtained.
